author: Allen Zhao
title: #true vs true vs #t ?
question: Just wondering if there's a difference between the hashtagged and non-hashtagged versions and if it's okay to use them interchangeably? They seem to both work the same from what limited testing I've done.
instructor_answer:
There is no difference other than readability; what is typically used in the course is true.
Somewhat important side note to students reading this: "true" is very different from true. One is a string containing the word true, and one is a boolean.
